questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: I hope my life in 10 years look like this, i hope to have a work in the reacherch in anthroplologie. I hope to have a family and a house in my actualy town. I want to travel a lot for work or for my own. I want to have a long lif with the poeple i care and i love. We will see what hapens
